# Gamma UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Border Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/border-button): A reactive border animation button that follows cursor movement using Framer Motion and CSS masks.
- [Inverted Cursor](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/inverted-cursor): A smooth, animated custom cursor component with blend mode effects.
- [Live Waveform](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/live-waveform): A customizable live audio waveform visualizer using the Web Audio API.
- [Overlay Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/overlay-button): An animated gradient button using Framer Motion with looping motion and spring transitions.
- [Pixel Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/pixel-button): A pixelated button animation effect built with Tailwind CSS and React.
- [Plasma](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/plasma): A mesmerizing plasma shader animation rendered with WebGL, perfect for dynamic backgrounds and previews.
- [Support Box](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/support-box): A collapsible animated support widget for quick help actions using Framer Motion.
- [Wavy Text Block](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/wavy-text-block): A scroll-triggered wavy text animation component that creates flowing motion effects using Framer Motion and scroll context.

## Examples

- [Live Waveform Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/live-waveform-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Support Box Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/support-box-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Overlay Button Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/overlay-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Border Button Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/border-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Wavy Text Block Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/wavy-text-block-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Inverted Cursor Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/inverted-cursor-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Pixel Button Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/pixel-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Plasma Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/plasma-demo.tsx): Example usage
